title: Distracted Boyfriend
joke: When you're in a relationship with Netflix, but Hulu and Amazon Prime catch your eye.

title: Two Buttons
joke: When you accidentally click 'Shutdown' instead of 'Restart'.

title: Mocking SpongeBob
joke: When your friend starts imitating your embarrassing moments.

title: Woman Yelling at a Cat
joke: When your cat knocks over your favorite vase, and you're trying to maintain your cool.

title: Drake Hotline Bling
joke: When you hear your phone ring, but it's just a telemarketer.

title: One Does Not Simply
joke: One does not simply fold a fitted sheet.

title: Doge
joke: Such meme, much wow, very internet.

title: Arthur Fist
joke: When someone eats the last slice of pizza without asking.

title: Surprised Pikachu
joke: When someone is surprised that it's Monday... every week.

title: Is This a Pigeon?
joke: When you're in a math class and have no idea what's going on.

title: Hide the Pain Harold
joke: When you pretend everything is fine, but you're actually dying inside.

title: SpongeBob Imagination
joke: When you're in a boring meeting, but your mind is on a beach vacation.

title: First World Problems
joke: When the Wi-Fi is down, and you have to use your mobile data like a peasant.

title: Confused Nick Young
joke: When someone explains quantum physics to you, and you're just lost.

title: Evil Kermit
joke: When you know you should eat a salad, but you order pizza instead.

title: Spider-Man Pointing at Spider-Man
joke: When you see someone wearing the same outfit as you at a party.

title: Mocking SpongeBob
joke: When someone asks if you've finished your work, and it's only Monday morning.

title: Drake Hotline Bling
joke: When someone asks, 'Do you want to build a snowman?' but you hate the cold.

title: Distracted Boyfriend
joke: When you have a dozen tabs open, but you keep opening new ones.

title: Two Buttons
joke: When you accidentally reply 'You too!' to the waiter who said, 'Enjoy your meal.'
